main event: An orbiting object with bright lights was observed over Las Vegas, Nevada, on November 12, 1957.
interesting points: The object reportedly had lights reminiscent of landing lights,The object's trajectory was noted by radar but was lost after a period of time,The observer commented on the object being possibly identified as a balloon or military aircraft,The sighting coincided with the presence of commercial aircraft in the vicinity,The object was reported to be in a flight pattern affecting air traffic.
sighted object: one orbiting object with bright lights
witness description: An observer who noted the object's lights and behavior
